sentences.sContent: Racial discrimination is abhorrent to my council and our staff.
sentences.sCn: 我的地方政府和全体工作人员与种族歧视水火不容。

synos.tran: 可恶的；厌恶的；格格不入的

remMethod.val: abhorren (看作abhorrence， 憎恶) + (en)t (…的) → 憎恶的 → 可恶的

trans.tranOther: something that is abhorrent is completely unacceptable because it seems morally wrong
